title: Blueprint, "Brown Palace Hotel: Eighth Floor Alterations", June 26, 1936
medium: Blueprint and graphite on white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed at lower center: EIGHTH FLOOR PLANS 1/4" SCALE; lower right: JUNE 26, 1936/JOB 263/SHEET/4/OF, SET; at right: ALTERNATIONS TO THE [loss]/WALTER H SIMON ARCHI [loss]; dimensions, descriptions throughout; perspective drawing of interior on verso in graphite
dimensions: H x W: 48.3 x 95.3 cm (19 in. x 37 1/2 in.), irregular
description: Floor plans for 8th floor of hotel, showing solarium, living rooms, studios, studio living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, bathrooms, closets, etc.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Brown Palace Hotel: Eighth Floor Alterations", June 26, 1936.
June 26, 1936. Blueprint and graphite on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-413.
